solution_line_template: The total amount of money that Zachary received from selling his video games is ${zachary_games_sold}*{price_per_game} = $<<{zachary_games_sold}*{price_per_game}={zachary_total_money}>>{zachary_total_money}

Jason received {jason_percentage_more}*${zachary_total_money} = $<<{jason_percentage_more}*{zachary_total_money}={jason_additional_money}>>{jason_additional_money} more than the amount Zachary received after selling his games.
The total amount of money that Jason received is ${jason_additional_money}+${zachary_total_money} = $<<{jason_additional_money}+{zachary_total_money}={jason_total_money}>>{jason_total_money}

Together, Zachary and Jason received ${jason_total_money}+${zachary_total_money} = $<<{jason_total_money}+{zachary_total_money}={zachary_jason_combined_money}>>{zachary_jason_combined_money} from the sale of their video games.
Ryan received ${jason_total_money}+${ryan_more_than_jason}=$<<{jason_total_money}+{ryan_more_than_jason}={ryan_total_money}>>{ryan_total_money} from the sale of his video games.

The three friends made a total of ${ryan_total_money}+${zachary_jason_combined_money} = $<<{ryan_total_money}+{zachary_jason_combined_money}={total_money_three_friends}>>{total_money_three_friends} from the sale of the video games.
